content:
Social Customer Service is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience. Replying to a service post without a case is available in Lightning Experience.
To administer Social Customer Service: Manage Users, Customize Application.

Effective May 3, 2022, the Social Customer Service Starter Pack is no longer available to customers who haven't previously enabled this feature. To use Social Customer Service, add the Social Publisher quick action to the Social Post page layout and turn on Feed Tracking for Social Posts and enable All Related Objects. Agents can reply to social posts from the detail page Chatter feed or from the list of social posts.
title: Service Cloud - Enable Service Post Reply Without a Case
